events.title: Louis Zamperini is taken prisoner by the Japanese

movie.title: Unbroken
movie.plot: The life of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic athlete who joined the armed forces during the second world war. Only to be captured by the Japanese navy after a plane crash in the Pacific. During his capture, Louie must continue his fight by surviving through the war.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 29 nominations.

events.title: Lester Stilwell, Watson Fisher and Joseph Dunn are all attacked by a shark

movie.title: 12 Days of Terror
movie.plot: July of 1916 was a time of record heat, a polio epidemic, and a World War in Europe. But beach-goers in New Jersey are threatened by a even greater terror: a shark that has suddenly developed a taste for human flesh. Starting July 1st and lasting over a period of 12 days, the unidentified shark kills four people and seriously injures a fifth before the attacks stop, and threatens New Jersey's thriving tourist industry. Based on true events.
